attributes.action: PAY FINANCIAL COMPENSATION OF 38 MILLION POUNDS FOR MYSELF AND MY FOUR CHILDREN AS A VICTIM OF DIRECT AND INSTITUTIONAL RACISM.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
